about_the_game:
Best Elf is an erotic 2D visual novel spinoff of Faulty Apprentice, following Eleanna and Zariinna. When an innocent competition between the two elves turns into a rescue mission, it's up to you and your friends to save the day! With two sexy elves and the world's greatest wizard at your side, what could go wrong?

CHARACTER


Eleanna
A haughty elf and Archery Instructor at Stars Reach Castle.
When she's not berating you for checking out her butt, she enjoys long walks in the Hidden Forest and feasting on vegetarian delights.


Zariinna
A devious dark elf trying to find her place in the kingdom of Thaelyn.
When she is not picking pockets or delving into dark magic, she enjoys solving riddles and testing her limits with spicy foods.

STORY

Since the battle, Stars Reach Castle has been peaceful and light. However, for a certain two elves, things haven't been going quite right... Is it the result of a contest with tunics most wet, or perhaps two personalities that conflict and don't set, a feud has erupted between two elves that just met.
From training proclivity to fun time activity, no matter the task, no matter the reason, these girls have not limit, well except maybe treason. Has Eleanna's want to be the best gone from desire to obsessed? Or have Zariinna's reprisals gone from taunts to torments? This rivalry is sure to get worse before it relents, and soon comes the time to give your two cents.

As Champion of Stars Reach, strong-bodied and good health, do you have what it takes to determine who is best elf?

The timeline of Faulty Apprentice: Best Elf takes place according to the true good ending of Faulty Apprentice. It is a standalone visual novel.

FEATURES

  • Animated illustration story CG's!
  • Multiple endings with different routes!
  • Harem ending! Why not both?
  • English voice by a talented cast of voice actors!
  • Gallery Mode! Enjoy the art you've unlocked at any time!
  • Set in the world of Faulty Apprentice.
  • This game contains full-body nudity, erotic dialogue, and consensual sexual act.

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

Join the conversation here or at X/Discord and let the AGL studios team know what you think of the game. We read all of the player's feedback!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Adult themes, language, and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

name: Best Elf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
